Text: helloPST Hi Cara Hows it going I left you a message the other day Just wanted to see if you are doing ok andor needed anything Emily loves that teddy bear you bought her Every morning I put it in her crib with her when she first wakes up and its her best friend She gives the bear the biggest smile Shes growing fast months now She rolls onto her stomach all the time and is eating cereal with a spoon Let me know how things are going Ill talk to you soon Susie Wilson

hello strangerPST Hello Hows life Mine is pretty good I have a face to face interview with Merch Pharmaceuticals I guess I did ok on the phone interview even though I didnt think theyd call me back Question for you I was wondering if you could change the first sentence in my letter of recommendation because it talks about FMLA leave and the dates I worked at Enron which I have on my resume but Id rather they didnt know that I have a little one because I dont want them to judge me by that or think Ill be a slacker because I wont and I already have the same babysitter set up and ready to go if I get lucky and get the job I could come by one afternoon this week to pick it up because my interview is Tuesday What do you think No big deal if not just thought Id try Also Im taking Emily to Gymboree a baby class and Chris Calgarsspelling wife and son are in it I just met her Tuesday for the first time I guess they are moving to Houston the end of March Hope all is well and maybe well see you soon Emily is such a chunk now Susie Wilson

hi againPST Hi I wanted to let you know I mailed my parking pass to you Its in todays mail I didnt know if someone would want to use it for the rest of August If not you can throw it away Also Im ordering that chocolate almond roca with chocolate ganache cake from Bvtn Bakery for Duanes BD and was wondering if there was a filling in the middle I couldnt remember Talk to you soon Susie
